body_html:
I met the same problem, finally, i solved it.
we make a file /usr/local/cuda&cuda-8.0/nvvm/libdevice ( libdevice.compute_50.10.bc) to (libdevice.10.bc).
It solved the problem.
tip:if you want change name easily, you should use this code:sudo nautilus

body:
I met the same problem, finally, i solved it. 
we make a file /usr/local/cuda&cuda-8.0/nvvm/libdevice ( libdevice.compute_50.10.bc) to (libdevice.10.bc).
It solved the problem.
tip:if you want change name easily, you should use this code:sudo nautilus
